name: SolarX
description: As part of the initiative to help accelerate the transition to renewable energy, our product, Solar X, envisions a brighter future for generations to come. By empowering the user to enlighten the potential earnings they would make by installing solar panels, we encourage the propagation of solar energy into the framework of society.

name: Data Manager
description: A data manager created using the Flet framework for Python. Retrieves data from a PostgreSQL database.

name: ChatGPT UI
description: A UI for the ChatGPT API developed using the Flet framework for Python. Allows users to chat with an AI.
